alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 09 at 4:55AM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 23 to 29 ft. * WHERE...All beaches and shorelines of Curry, Coos, and Douglas Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Extremely large breaking waves will create very hazardous conditions along beaches and area shorelines. Waves will inundate beaches and surge into normally dry areas. Infrastructure damage and significant beach erosion can be expected. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Beaches and coastlines will become hazardous due to very large and life-threatening surf conditions. Stay off of beaches, rocks, jetties,piers, and other waterside infrastructure.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
